Detailed Description

This is the "about" screen and the highscore table
See also:
IState

the destructor

Member Function Documentation

virtual void CAbout::activate (  )  [virtual]

This is an implementation of IState::activate. This time not much has to be done, the image is loaded, the event receiver is set and the highscore is loaded

See also:
IState::activate

Implements IState.

virtual void CAbout::deactivate (  )  [virtual]

Deactivate the state. Here we clear the scene, the GUI and destroy the hiscore object

Implements IState.

virtual bool CAbout::OnEvent ( const SEvent &  evt  )  [virtual]

The event receiver for the Irrlicht event pipeline. The two states of this class (about, hiscore) are switched with any key. If a key is pressed when the highscore is up the state is ended, and the first key release is ignored (this release would lead back to the main menu way to early.

Parameters:
evt the event to be handled

virtual int CAbout::update (  )  [virtual]

Just check if the state should be ended

Implements IState.
